name: Space MiG
description:
Space MiG is a simple, 2D, top down, space shooter project for the Game Design & Development  specialization. 

Changes Overview

General - Menu Aesthetics, Background and Assets. 

Specific
Level 1 - Enemy stations that spawn spherical drones. 

Level 2 - Stations that spawn slightly stronger enemy planes.  

Level 3 - Boss fight.

Original Image Link.
Asset Link .
For more details , please run the game and check the instructions. 

Looking forward to your comments and recommendations.
